0.npcText: Captain, guess what? This is another 'twin' star system.

replies.replyText: The third one? I have to admit, version with their natural origin looks less and less probable to me.
And still no trace of who could have done it?
And still no trace of who can have don it?

2.npcText: No. This star system looks perfectly virgin, just like the others.

replies.replyText: Maybe if we ask another races we will learn something about it. We can not be the first ones to notice it
